title: Update regarding LuxeBrands
story_body:
LuxeBrands Reports Financial Results for Quarter Ended December 31, 2022, at 4:05 PM ET

LuxeBrands (LUXE) announced its financial results for the quarter ended December 31, 2022, after the market close at 4:05 PM ET. The company reported revenue of $1.23 billion, representing a 22% increase from $1.01 billion in the same period last year.

Total sales for the quarter grew 25% year-over-year, driven by a 30% increase in the company's core segment. LuxeBrands attributed the strong sales growth to increased demand for its luxury products, as well as successful marketing and brand expansion initiatives.

Gross margin for the quarter expanded 120 basis points to 43.8%, reflecting the company's focus on optimizing its product mix and improving operational efficiency.

LuxeBrands also reported a significant increase in its international sales, with revenue from outside the United States growing 35% year-over-year. This growth was driven by the company's strategic expansion into new markets and the strength of its global brand portfolio.

The company's financial results for the quarter demonstrate its ability to drive growth and expand its market share in the luxury goods industry. LuxeBrands' strong revenue growth and improving gross margin position the company for continued success in the future.
